type: Superalgos Review - Great Getting Started Tutorials But Not Fully Stable

definition.text: Write a summary for this review page.

paragraphs.text: Great GUI - hierarchy, options to move icons around, create backups, and workspaces.

Although, an opportunity to improve troubleshooting errors exists (e.g. providing more on-screen user feedback). A couple of errors occured for me during the getting started tutorials, which made my learning experience a little frustrating.
Otherwise, I'm looking forward to exploring the full potential of the app framework! :)
